kdl.prox.qgraph2
Class Query

java.lang.Object
  kdl.prox.qgraph2.AbstractQuery
      kdl.prox.qgraph2.Query
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Query
extends AbstractQuery

A concrete query class. Created either from a xml file or via the application of a Transformation. Also defines testing and editing commands that are useful to Transformation instances.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

public Query(java.lang.String name,

Method Detail

absorbEdgeAndVertex

public void absorbEdgeAndVertex(QGEdge qgEdgeY,
                                QGVertex qgVertexB)
TFM edit utility that "absorbs" qgEdgeY and qgVertexB (the "absorbee") into qgEdgeY's other vertex (the "absorber"). Handles edges related to the two vertices in this way:

o edges between the two vertices (other than qgEdgeY) are changed into self loops on the absorber

o all other qgVertexB edges are connected to the absorber

connectedComponents

public java.util.List connectedComponents()
Top-level method called after constructor, returns results of connected components calculation.

Returns:
a List of Sets, one Set for each connected component in me

getAbsQueryChildren

public java.util.List getAbsQueryChildren()
Returns:
List of all AbsQueryChild instances in me (QGItem and Subquery only), recursively. does not include this Query

getDescription

public java.lang.String getDescription()

getName

public java.lang.String getName()

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object anObject)
Object method. Returns true if I "equal" (in the transformation expansion sense) query. Works by leveraging the fact that all items in a query (including ConsQGVertex instances) are comparable and can be sorted: We sort items from the two queries by name, then compare them one-by-one. We also test asterisked items by verifying they have the same source. Finally, we also check that the total number of subqueries is the same.

todo define hashCode()!

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object

flattenSubquery

public void flattenSubquery(Subquery subquery)
TFM edit utility that "flattens" subquery by moving its items up to its parent, then removing subquery from the parent.

isConsolidated

public boolean isConsolidated()
Returns true if I contain only a single non-annotated ConsQGVertex with no asterisk, and I contain no subqueries or edges, nor constraints

numEdges

public int numEdges()

numVertices

public int numVertices()

removeEdgeFromParent

public void removeEdgeFromParent(QGEdge qgEdge)
TFM edit utility that removes QGEdge from its parent, and from its vertices. NB: Not named removeEdge() - causes infinite loops!

replaceQGVertex

public void replaceQGVertex(QGVertex currQGVertex,
                            QGVertex newQGVertex)
TFM edit utility that replaces currQGVertex in its containing AbstractQuery with newQGVertex by changing all links to it to instead point to newQGVertex.
